name: Speak to Us About the App
description: ave a conversation with us about your experience using the app so far.

name: Give Us Feedback
description: Provide your honest feedback on the app to help us improve.

name: Share Your Favorite Feature
description: Let us know which feature of the app you like the most and why.

name: Complete a Survey
description: Fill out a short survey about your user experience to help us gather valuable insights.

name: Show Us Your Favorite Item
description: Share your favorite item and tell us why it's special to you.

name: Show Us Your Favorite Task
description: Describe your favorite task in the app.

name: Joke of the Day
description: Share a joke to brighten everyone's day. It can be a classic or one you made up yourself.
